posts.title: spring boot 整合 mybatis
posts.text: 一、项目结构 二、添加maven依赖 spring依赖<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-web</artifactId></dependency><dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-tomcat</artifactId></dependency> mybatis依赖<dependency> <groupId>org.mybatis.spring.boot</groupId> <artifactId>mybatis-spring-boot-starter</artifactId> <version>1.1.1</version></dependency><dependency><groupId>mysql</groupId> <artifactId>mysql-connector-java</artifactId> <version>6.0.4</version></dependency> 三、项目进行配置 1.application.yml添加配置server: port: 8088 spring: datasource: name: test url: jdbc:mysql://localhost:3306/数据库名?useUnicode=true&characterEncoding=utf-8&serverTimezone=GMT%2b8 username: 用户名 password: 密码 mybatis: typeAliasesPackage: com.springboot.lg.springboot.entity mapperLocations: classpath:mapper/*.xml 2.Application添加注解@MapperScan("com.springboot.lg.springboot.dao-Mapper包位置") 3.Dao层编写 4.mapper编写123456789101112131415161718192021222324252627282930313233343536373839404142434445464748495051525354这里做部分展示<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?><!DOCTYPE mapper PUBLIC "-//mybatis.org//DTD Mapper 3.0//EN" "http://mybatis.org/dtd/mybatis-3-mapper.dtd" ><mapper namespace="com.springboot.lg.springboot.dao.StaffMapper" > <resultMap id="BaseResultMap" type="com.springboot.lg.springboot.entity.Staff" > <id column="staff_id" property="staffId" jdbcType="INTEGER" /> <result column="staff_user_id" property="staffUserId" jdbcType="VARCHAR" /> <result column="staff_open_id" property="staffOpenId" jdbcType="VARCHAR" /> <result column="staff_name" property="staffName" jdbcType="VARCHAR" /> <result column="staff_phone" property="staffPhone" jdbcType="VARCHAR" /> <result column="staff_role" property="staffRole" jdbcType="INTEGER" /> <result column="staff_tag" property="staffTag" jdbcType="INTEGER" /> <result column="create_date" property="createDate" jdbcType="TIMESTAMP" /> <result column="create_by" property="createBy" jdbcType="INTEGER" /> <result column="del_flag" property="delFlag" jdbcType="INTEGER" /> </resultMap> <sql id="Base_Column_List" > staff_id, staff_user_id, staff_open_id, staff_name, staff_phone, staff_role, create_date, create_by, del_flag </sql> <select id="selectByPrimaryKey" resultMap="BaseResultMap" parameterType="java.lang.Integer" > select <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> from staff where staff_id = #{staffId,jdbcType=INTEGER} </select> <select id="getByUserId" resultMap="BaseResultMap" parameterType="String" > select <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> from staff where staff_user_id = #{id} AND del_flag = 0 </select> <select id="getByOpenId" resultMap="BaseResultMap" parameterType="String" > select <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> from staff where staff_open_id = #{id} AND del_flag = 0 </select> <select id="findList" resultMap="BaseResultMap"> select <include refid="Base_Column_List" /> from staff where del_flag = 0 limit #{startnum},#{size} </select> <select id="countfindList" resultType="java.lang.Integer"> select COUNT(*) from staff where del_flag = 0 </select></mapper>

posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment
